node_1.task_summary: Generate a comprehensive analysis of renewable energy trends in 2025

node_2.task_summary: Based on the analysis, identify the top 3 investment opportunities in renewable energy

node_3.task_summary: Create a concise executive summary of the analysis and investment opportunities

node_4.task_summary: Generate visualizations and data representations that support the analysis

node_5.task_summary: Create a final report combining all previous outputs into a cohesive document

node_6.task_summary: Identify key entities and their relationships in the analysis
